eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteButton
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A button that can be customized.
description: The button can be customized with a background for each state and a label. It handles user interactions and a simple condition can be used to check if it is clicked.
There are ready-to-use buttons in the asset-store [menu buttons pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=menu-buttons-menu-buttons).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The finite state machine used internally by the button object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonFSM

events.comment: The "Validated" state only last one frame.
Make sure the cursor position is only checked once per frame.
Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

eventsFunctions.description: Reset the state of the button.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetState

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is not used.
eventsFunctions.name: IsIdle

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button was just clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the cursor is hovered over the button.
eventsFunctions.name: IsHovered

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is either hovered or pressed but not hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFocused

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed outside with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressedOutside

eventsFunctions.description: the touch id that is using the button or 0 if none.
eventsFunctions.name: TouchId

eventsBasedObjects.description: A button that can be customized.
eventsBasedObjects.name: PanelSpriteButton

events.comment:
Create one background instance for of each state.
Only the instance for the current state is shown.
Place the label over the backgrounds.
Show the right background accordingly to the new state.

Children instances must be resized when the button size change:
- backgrounds for each state are resized to take the full dimensions of the button
- the label is put back at the center of the button

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteSlider
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A draggable slider that users can move to select a numerical value.
description: A draggable slider that users can move to select a numerical value. The slider can be customized with sprites.
There are ready-to-use sliders in the asset-store [settings UI pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=settings-ui-settings-ui).

eventsBasedObjects.description: Let users select a numerical value by dragging a slider.
eventsBasedObjects.name: PanelSpriteSlider

events.comment: This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the child-object instances.
Create the label that is displayed over the thumb.
Pass the configuration to the behavior.

Children instances must be resized when the parent size change:
- background is resized to take the full dimensions of the parent
- the label is put back at the center of the bar

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

parameters: max(Background.BoundingBoxRight(), max(Label.BoundingBoxRight(), Thumb.BoundingBoxRight())) - min(Background.BoundingBoxLeft(), min(Label.BoundingBoxLeft(), Thumb.BoundingBoxLeft()))
max(Background.BoundingBoxBottom(), max(Label.BoundingBoxBottom(), Thumb.BoundingBoxBottom())) - min(Background.BoundingBoxTop(), min(Label.BoundingBoxTop(), Thumb.BoundingBoxTop()))

events.comment: The parent size is not defined in onCreate so it needs to be done here.

eventsFunctions.name: MaxValue

eventsFunctions.description: the step size of the slider.
eventsFunctions.name: StepSize

eventsFunctions.name: IsLabelShown

eventsFunctions.description: Center the bar according to the button configuration. This is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is resized.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: LinkTools
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Conditions to use Linked Objects as a graph and a path finding movement behavior.
description: * "Can reach through links" conditions, useful to check if an object is linked to another through one or more other linked objects.
* a path finding movement behavior that uses objects links (instead of obstacles for the other behavior)
For instance, it can be helpful for grid-based games like:
* Point and click (bypass obstacles with a predetermined polygonal chain)

eventsFunctions.description: Link to neighbors on a rectangular grid.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Link to neighbors on a rectangular grid
eventsFunctions.name: LinkRectangularNeighbors
eventsFunctions.sentence: Link _PARAM1_ and its neighbors _PARAM2_  on a rectangular grid with cell dimensions: _PARAM3_; _PARAM4_

parameters.longDescription: The 2 objects can't be the same.
parameters.name: Neighbor

eventsFunctions.description: Link to neighbors on a hexagonal grid.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Link to neighbors on a hexagonal grid
eventsFunctions.name: LinkHexagonalNeighbors
eventsFunctions.sentence: Link _PARAM1_ and its neighbors _PARAM2_  on a hexagonal grid with cell dimensions: _PARAM3_; _PARAM4_

parameters.longDescription: The 2 objects can't be the same.
parameters.name: Neighbor

eventsFunctions.description: Link to neighbors on an isometric grid.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Link to neighbors on an isometric grid
eventsFunctions.name: LinkIsometricRectangularNeighbors
eventsFunctions.sentence: Link _PARAM1_ and its neighbors _PARAM2_  on an isometric grid with cell dimensions: _PARAM3_; _PARAM4_

parameters.longDescription: The 2 objects can't be the same.
parameters.name: Neighbor

eventsFunctions.description: Can reach through a given cost sum.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Can reach with links limited by cost
eventsFunctions.name: CanReachWithMaxWeight
eventsFunctions.sentence: Take into account all "_PARAM1_" that can reach _PARAM2_ with initial value from the variable _PARAM3_ through at most a cost of: _PARAM4_ according to cost class: _PARAM5_ and at most _PARAM6_ links depth

inlineCode: * Insert a node in an array sorted by farest 1st
// mark every instance that can be reached through links
// openObjects is the new discovered instances where links must be checked
// nearest last because pop is o(1)
// and it must be in the set given by the caller
// filter the instances to only keep the one marked with the pick attribute

parameters.description: if they can reach this object
parameters.name: TargetObject

parameters.longDescription: Leave empty to make everything crossable with cost = 1. It looks in the variable children of linktools_Cost. No child means not crossable, the cost must be positive.
parameters.name: CostClass

eventsFunctions.description: Can reach through a given number of links.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Can reach with links limited by length
eventsFunctions.name: CanReachWithMaxLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: Take into account all "_PARAM1_" that can reach _PARAM2_ through at most _PARAM3_ links according to cost class: _PARAM4_

inlineCode: // mark every instance that can be reached through links
// openObjects is the new discovered instances where links must be checked
// and it must be in the set given by the caller
// filter the instances to only keep the one marked with the pick attribute

parameters.description: if they can reach this object
parameters.name: TargetObject

parameters.longDescription: Leave empty to make everything crossable with cost = 1. It looks in the variable children of linktools_Cost. No child means not crossable, the cost can be 0 or 1.
parameters.name: CostClass

eventsFunctions.description: Can reach through links.
eventsFunctions.name: CanReach
eventsFunctions.sentence: Take into account all "_PARAM1_" that can reach _PARAM2_ through links

inlineCode: // mark every instance that can be reached through links
// openObjects is the new discovered instances where links must be checked
// and it must be in the set given by the caller
// filter the instances to only keep the one marked with the pick attribute

parameters.description: if they can reach this object
parameters.name: TargetObject

eventsFunctions.description: Cost sum.
eventsFunctions.name: CostSum

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The object will move from one object instance to another according to how they are linked to one another to reach a targeted object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: LinkPathFinding

events.comment: Move the object along the path

eventsFunctions.description: Move the object to a position.
eventsFunctions.name: MoveTo
eventsFunctions.sentence: Move _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ passing by _PARAM2_ using cost class _PARAM4_

events.comment:
Search the path and set the result in the path variable.
This variable is use by doStepPreEvent to move the object along the path.

inlineCode: * Insert a node in an array sorted by farest 1st
// mark every instance that can be reached through links
// openObjects is the new discovered instances where links must be checked
// and it must be in the set given by the caller
// build the path in the path variable
